value:
Princess Sharena started chatting
with me while I was in the middle of
my "normal practice."$k$pShe grew quite fond of me in that
time, so now I'm not sure when I
can stop acting like that...

Robin once said I should act more
normal, so today I'm putting my
"normal practice" to use. Huzzah!

Am I chilly in this outfit? How sweet of
you to be concerned for my welfare!
But I'm fine.$k$pTo be honest...it's usually other
people who get the chills around
me. Oh-ho-ho...

Would you be so kind as to escort me
to a shop here in Askr, huzzah? I
must buy a "gift" for my dear Robin.

Oh-ho, you think my outfit is cute?
Stare too long, and...$k$pI'll burn you with this candle.

Oh-ho and huzzah! I've brought you
a festive greeting from your friend
$Nf!

Gracious, look how I've grown!
It had better not be a curse...

Huzzah! Aren't you proud of my
hard work?
What is the meaning of this?

New power? Huzzah, and... Um...
Something...normal-sounding?

Oh-ho and huzzah! I'm Tharja, just a
typically normally plain girl! Have a
happy winter festival!$k$pDo you think Robin heard me
being normal?

Why good day,
$Nu! How fare
you? Enjoying the weather?$k$pHuzzah, I baked you a pie! I do so
adore baking. It's even topped with a
blood-colored—er, red—berry sauce.$k$pIt's a special gift just for Y-O-U, for
taking such good care of me.$k$pGive me just a moment to slash it—
I mean, slice it—into ribbons—I
mean, into pieces...$k$pOh-ho-ho, what a lovely and deep
cut! Doesn't the oozing sauce remind
you of a beautiful curse?$k$pOh, er... I mean... Huzzah, or... Hm.
I seem to have forgotten my "normal
practice."$k$pWell, I guess it's no use pretending
anymore. This is the real me: a hex-
loving, curse-slinging witch.$k$pI take it you're disappointed?$k$pYou're not disappointed at all? Well,
thank you. You're...surprisingly kind...$k$pI suppose it's OK to celebrate the
winter festival as my true self...
Just because it's with you.
ほら☆
Well?
ううっ
I'll curse you!
Celebrate with me.
This is for you.
I'll dye YOU red.
Time to feast!
I'll go change...
Heeheehee
This is a typically normally plain Winter Festival outfit! Isn't it...?
This outfit is a bit...merrier than I'm used to...
I'm going to cook you a Winter Festival feast! I already have a chicken…
Allow me to slice you some cake. I have just the blade...
Come sunrise, you may find a little gift beneath your pillow...
I wonder if this is normal enough for Robin...
You've been a good Summoner this year, so I have a present for you! Don't worry. It's perfectly safe…
Good day!
Huzzah?
What?
Look at me. All dressed up and ready to celebrate! Huzzah!
